title: History of Apple Inc. - Wikipedia
snippet: The company offers its products online and has a chain of retail stores known as Apple Stores. Founders Steve Jobs, Steve Wozniak, and Ronald Wayne created Apple Computer Co. on April 1, 1976, to market Wozniak's Apple I desktop computer, and Jobs and Wozniak incorporated the company on January ...

title: Apple Inc. - Wikipedia
snippet: Founded in 1976 as Apple Computer Company by Steve Jobs, Steve Wozniak and Ronald Wayne, the company was incorporated by Jobs and Wozniak as Apple Computer, Inc. the following year. It was renamed to its current name in 2007 as the company had expanded its focus from computers to consumer ...

title: Apple Inc. | History, Products, Headquarters, & Facts | Britannica Money
snippet: Apple Inc. is an American multinational technology company that revolutionized the technology sector through its innovation of computer software, personal computers, mobile tablets, smartphones, and computer peripherals.

title: History of Apple Inc. | PDF | Macintosh | I Cloud
snippet: Steve Jobs and Steve Wozniak founded Apple Inc. in 1976 after creating the Apple I computer. The Apple I was sold as a kit to hobbyists. In 1977, they released the Apple II, the first personal computer that was successful for mainstream consumers.
